Plot: &#039;L.A. Confidential&#039; is "tough, gorgeous and vastly entertaining" (Janet Maslin, &#039;The New York Times&#039;), "a genuine masterpiece that will knock your socks off" (Rex Reed) and won 1997 Academy Awards for Best Supporting Actress (Kim Basinger) and Best Adapted Screenplay (Brian Helgeland & Curtis Hanson).  Director Curtis Hanson and a terrific cast serve up a "ravishing, thrilling tale of police corruption and Hollywood glamour" (Marshall Fine, &#039;Gannett Newspapers&#039;) in this film version of James Ellroy&#039;s novel.  Three cops (Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce), a call girl (Kim Basinger), a mysterious millionaire (David Strathairn), a tabloid journalist (Danny DeVito), and the Chief of Detectives (James Cromwell) fuel a labyrinthine plot rife with mystery, ambition, romance, and humor.

Extras: 
1.L.A. Confidential: Off the Record -Featurette
2.Director Curtis Hanson&#039;s Photo Pitch -Featurette
3.The L.A. of L.A. Confidential -Location Tour (15)
4.Soundtrack Promo with Curtis Hanson
5.Theatrical Trailer
6.TV Spots (3)
